column4: Hi all, I need help, i'm a newbie and i installed Ubuntu and later i installed windows xp and have a dual boot, but the problem is i lost the grub screen and the computer automatically boots into Winddows, can anyone help me getting back the grub screen
yeah xp overwrites the master boot record... you should install xp first an then ubuntu... thats easiest
i don't know... I only know that the easiest is to install xp first... xp is evil and it will always try to take over your computer=)
